mission_data.mission_description: You are ordered to get refit with some prototype equipment.^^Suggested Ship: (any)^^Level Selectable (suggested 6-7)^^Multi-ship compatible^^GM Options

event.name: Create Initial Sector
event.incoming_comms_text: Mission Goals:^1. Destroy secret research installation.^^2. Destroy any enemy ships fitted with prototypes.

event.name: Start Game Pressed
event.incoming_comms_text: Decryption Complete^^Recently intercepted communications indicate a new enemy technology is in the final stages of development. The main hup is a secret research station located in the Nox system.^^You are to conduct a deep-strike mission. Destroy the station and any enemy vessels which may be fitted with prototypes.^^The TSN Long Haul will accompany you to provide refit support.

folder_arme.name: Trithel Particles, Targeting Heat, and Warp Blocker

event.name: Warp Blocker Trap Details
event.incoming_comms_text: Query Subject: Trithel Particles^^Reference: Trithel Nebula^Location: Outer Grant Sector (contested regions)^Maping Status: Unmapped (95% Incomplete)^^Notes:^1. The Trithel Nebula Contains unique particles which immediately collapse warp fields (reason unknown). Both are named after nebula discoverer, Dr. Henry Trithel.^^2. Targeting sensors require proximity callibration within regions of Trithel particles.^^3. Sensor range is limited within the Trithel Nebula. Use extreme caution.^^4. TSN Astrometrics theorizes that Trithel particles are the result of a uniquely massive gravimetric explosion.

event.name: Warp Blocker Trap Activated
event.incoming_comms_text: Test system active.^^General order to all ships: Begin operations.

event.name: Warp Blocker Trap Triggered 0
event.incoming_comms_text: Contact the squadron commanders and call the Pariah.^^Tell them to activate the blocker on my signal...^^MARK!^

event.incoming_comms_text: Contact the squadron commanders and call the Pariah.^^Tell them to activate the blocker on my signal...^^MARK!^

event.incoming_comms_text: Contact the squadron commanders and call the Pariah.^^Tell them to activate the blocker on my signal...^^MARK!^

event.name: Warp Blocker Trap Triggered 4
event.incoming_comms_text: Contact the squadron commanders and call the Pariah.^^Tell them to activate the blocker on my signal...^^MARK!^

event.name: Warp Blocker Trap Triggered 6
event.incoming_comms_text: Contact the squadron commanders and call the Pariah.^^Tell them to activate the blocker on my signal...^^MARK!^

event.name: Warp Blocker Trap Triggered 7
event.incoming_comms_text: Contact the squadron commanders and call the Pariah.^^Tell them to activate the blocker on my signal...^^MARK!^

event.name: All stations destroyed, Warp Block Offline
Destroy Mesh and Move Station Vinc 2
Destroy Mesh and Move Station Hart
Destroy Mesh and Move Station Arin
Mission Objectives Reminder
event.incoming_comms_text: Mission Objectives^^1. Destroy the secret research installation.^^2. Destroy any ships with prototype technology.

event.name: Mission Create Enemy Properties
event.incoming_comms_text: Sensors are recallibrated and back online.^^No enemy signatures detected.

set_ship_text.name: Vinc 2
set_ship_text.desc: Skaraan Starbase. Scan interference detected. Proximity (under 800k) required.

event.name: Destroy Mesh and Move Station Horla
event.incoming_comms_text: All ships!^The enemy has found the Horla. Repeat, station has been located!^^Initiate emergency protocols.

event.name: Activate Warp Trap and Send Warning
Refit Message and Variable and Counter Start
event.incoming_comms_text: This is the Long Haul. We are preparing refit supplies for the mission, and should have a new batch ready for you every five minutes.^^Just stop on by to get them.

set_ship_text.name: GravTorp
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Analysis: will reduce shield power upon impact. WARNING: May create extreme gravity stress upon detonation.

set_ship_text.name: Pariah
set_ship_text.desc: Unknown Hull Material. Extreme Gravimetric Distortions.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Warning: Unknown Equipment Detected! Shield Drain, Shield Vamp, Shield Reset, HET, Anti-Torp, Tractor
